note:
I am a retired software engineer from Reading in the UK.

One of my hobbies is devising novel puzzles. Last year I started posting some of them on social media. It's a not-for-profit venture.

If you have an iPhone or an iPad you might like to try my app. It's called Lazy Dog Word Puzzle. You'll find it on App Store. It is free, there are no ads and you are not asked for any personal details.
